title: Chocolate And Tents: The First Box
description: If it can go wrong it will go wrong, and it normally does. Becky encouraged by her boyfriend, Cal, agrees to go camping for the first time.Nothing prepares her for a field in the middle of nowhere. Toilets, what toilets? Becky is forced to fall back on chocolate to survive. Cowpats are not a girl's best friend and the farmer is grumpier than the Seven Dwarfs.To say Becky is a little gullible would be an understatement. Becky finds herself doing the bidding of Hunter and Inca, middle aged hippies and seasoned campers. This is one camping trip never to be forgotten. Rumours are rife of a spooky bushman who lurks around the campsite.Can Becky save the day and restore normality or has the madness taken over leading to an endless comedy of errors?
author: Roger David Francis
